mapper.select: SELECT users.id as userId, users.username as userName, users.avatar as userAvatar, users.employee_id as employeeId, organizations.org_id as orgId, organizations.org_name as orgName, users.dept_id as deptId, departments.dept_name as deptName, users.job_id as jobId, jobs.job_name as jobName, EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM friends WHERE (user_id = #{curLoginUserId} AND friend_id = users.id) OR (user_id = users.id AND friend_id = #{curLoginUserId})) as isFriend FROM users LEFT JOIN organizations ON organizations.org_id = users.org_id LEFT JOIN departments ON departments.dept_id = users.dept_id LEFT JOIN jobs ON jobs.job_id = users.job_id WHERE users.id = #{userId}
